thread.section_title: Cash Train Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cash Train | cashtrain.com.au
thread.title: Michael

author: Michael
title: Michael
text: The application process was quick and easy, all done online. Once my application was approved I had the money in my account on the same day. The repayments are reasonable over a longer period of time than other short term lenders offer. Overall happy with their products and service. Will definitely look to use them rather than other lenders, in the future if the need arises.
